name: The End Of The Narrator
description:
Enter full screen to see the the whole game, you may need to zoom out your page otherwise we reccomend downloading the game

Controls:

A/D to move, W/Spacebar to jump, R reset.

Story:

You play as a character called Harold is in in a world war 3 safety bunker, the narrator tells the story of what harold is MEANT to do.

Stuck?

You can move boxes between rooms, they can also stack.

Doors can sometimes be opened by keys, buttons or weighted buttons.
